docs.title: Home
docs.text: • Hescore_Json

docs.title: About
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title assessment_type enum assessment_date string date comments ['string', 'null'] comment_api_only string dwelling_unit_type enum manufactured_home_sections enum year_built integer number_bedrooms integer num_floor_above_grade integer floor_to_ceiling_height number conditioned_floor_area number orientation enum blower_door_test boolean air_sealing_present boolean envelope_leakage integer

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate dwelling_unit_type is manufactured_home manufactured_home_sections is present dwelling_unit_type is not manufactured_home manufactured_home_sections is not present blower_door_test is True envelope_leakage is present blower_door_test is not True envelope_leakage is not present dwelling_unit_type is one of [apartment_unit, manufactured_home] num_floor_above_grade is not present dwelling_unit_type is not one of [apartment_unit, manufactured_home] num_floor_above_grade is present

docs.title: assessment_type
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: enum
Value initial final qa alternative test corrected mentor preconstruction

docs.title: assessment_date
docs.text:
Date the assessment was performed

  • is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: comments
docs.text:
Free text comment field

  • is not required
  • Type: ['string', 'null']

docs.title: comment_api_only
docs.text:
Pass through field for use by api users

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: dwelling_unit_type
docs.text:
The type of dwelling unit

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value single_family_detached single_family_attached apartment_unit manufactured_home

docs.title: manufactured_home_sections
docs.text:
The sections of a manufactured home

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value single-wide double-wide triple-wide

docs.title: year_built
docs.text:
Year building was built

  • is required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1600

docs.title: number_bedrooms
docs.text:
Number of bedrooms in house

  • is required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 10

docs.title: num_floor_above_grade
docs.text:
Number of floors above grade. Assumes 1 when dwelling_unit_type is apartment_unit

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 4

docs.title: floor_to_ceiling_height
docs.text:
Floor to ceiling height (feet)

  • is required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 6 Maximum Number: 15

docs.title: conditioned_floor_area
docs.text:
Total conditioned floor area (square feet)

  • is required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 250 Maximum Number: 25000

docs.title: orientation
docs.text:
Orientation of the front door

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value north north_east east south_east south south_west west north_west

docs.title: blower_door_test
docs.text:
Was a blower door test performed on this house?

  • is required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: air_sealing_present
docs.text:
Has the building been air sealed?

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: envelope_leakage
docs.text:
Building air leakage measured with a blower door (CFM50) (only used if blower_door_test is true)

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 25000

docs.title: Address
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema

docs.title: Address
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title address string address2 ['string', 'null'] city string state enum zip_code string external_building_id string

docs.title: address
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: address2
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: ['string', 'null']

docs.title: city
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: state
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: enum
Value AL AK AZ AR CA CO CT DE FL GA HI ID IL IN IA KS KY LA ME MD MA MI MN MS MO MT NE NV NH NJ NM NY NC ND OH OK OR PA RI SC SD TN TX UT VT VA WA WV WI WY DC

docs.title: zip_code
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: string

Regex Pattern: ^[0-9]{5}$

docs.title: external_building_id
docs.text:
Allows an organization to assign an ID to the building for that organization's internal use. This field has no impact within the HES system, except that it can be filtered on in some of the retrieve_* methods.

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: Cooling
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / hvac / hvac_item

docs.title: Cooling
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title type string efficiency_method enum year integer efficiency number efficiency_unit enum

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate efficiency_method exists AND efficiency_method is shipment_weighted year is present AND efficiency is not presentefficiency_unit is not present efficiency_method exists AND efficiency_method is not shipment_weighted year existsefficiency_method is user type is one of [split_dx, heat_pump, mini_split] efficiency_unit is one of [seer, seer2] AND efficiency is minimum value of 8, maximum value of 40 type is packaged_dx efficiency_unit is one of [eer, ceer] AND efficiency is minimum value of 8, maximum value of 40 type is gchp efficiency_unit is eer AND efficiency is minimum value of 8, maximum value of 40 type is one of [mini_split, gchp] efficiency_method is user type is one of [dec, none] efficiency_method is not presentefficiency_unit is not presentefficiency is not presentyear is not present

docs.title: type
docs.text:
Cooling equipment type

  • is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: packaged_dx

Constant: split_dx

Constant: heat_pump

Constant: gchp

Constant: dec

Constant: mini_split

Constant: none

docs.title: efficiency_method
docs.text:
Method to determine cooling efficiency

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value user shipment_weighted

docs.title: year
docs.text:
Year equipment was manufactured (only used if efficiency_method is shipment_weighted)

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1970

docs.title: efficiency
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: number

Comment: Additional requirements for this property apply based on the cooling system type

docs.title: efficiency_unit
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: enum
Value eer ceer seer seer2

Comment: Additional requirements for this property apply based on the cooling system type

docs.title: Domestic hot water
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems

docs.title: Domestic Hot Water
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title category enum type string fuel_primary string efficiency_method enum year integer efficiency number efficiency_unit enum

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate type is one of [indirect, tankless_coil] category is combined category is unit fuel_primary, efficiency_method are present category is unit AND efficiency_method is shipment_weighted year is present category is unit AND efficiency_method is not shipment_weighted year is not present category is unit AND efficiency_method is user efficiency, efficiency_unit are present category is unit AND efficiency_method is not user efficiency, efficiency_unit are not present type is storage AND efficiency_method is one of [user, shipment_weighted] AND fuel_primary is fuel_oil efficiency is minimum value of 0.45, maximum value of 0.95 type is storage AND efficiency_method is one of [user, shipment_weighted] AND fuel_primary is one of [natural_gas, lpg] efficiency is minimum value of 0.5, maximum value of 0.95 type is storage AND efficiency_method is one of [user, shipment_weighted] AND fuel_primary is electric efficiency is minimum value of 0.86, maximum value of 0.95 type is tankless AND efficiency_method is user AND fuel_primary is one of [fuel_oil, natural_gas, lpg] efficiency is minimum value of 0.7, maximum value of 0.99 type is tankless AND efficiency_method is user AND fuel_primary is electric efficiency is minimum value of 0.86, maximum value of 0.99 type is heat_pump efficiency_method is user AND efficiency is minimum value of 1, maximum value of 5 AND fuel_primary is electric

docs.title: category
docs.text:
Water heater category

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value unit combined

docs.title: type
docs.text:
Water heater type

  • is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: storage

Constant: heat_pump

Constant: indirect

Constant: tankless_coil

Constant: tankless

docs.title: fuel_primary
docs.text:
Primary water heater fuel

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: electric

Constant: natural_gas

Constant: lpg

Constant: fuel_oil

docs.title: efficiency_method
docs.text:
Method to determine water heater efficiency

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value user shipment_weighted

docs.title: year
docs.text:
Year water heater was manufactured (only used if efficiency_method is shipment_weighted)

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1972

docs.title: efficiency
docs.text:
Efficiency of water heater (only used if efficiency_method is user)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

docs.title: efficiency_unit
docs.text:
Unit of water heater efficiency

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value ef uef

docs.title: Heating

docs.title: Heating
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title type string fuel_primary string efficiency_method enum year integer efficiency number efficiency_unit enum

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate efficiency_method exists AND efficiency_method is shipment_weighted year is present AND efficiency is not presentefficiency_unit is not present efficiency_method exists AND efficiency_method is not shipment_weighted year existsefficiency_method is user type is none fuel_primary is not presentefficiency_method is not presentyear is not presentefficiency is not presentefficiency_unit is not present type is not none fuel_primary is present type is one of [central_furnace, wall_furnace, boiler] AND fuel_primary is electric efficiency is not presentefficiency_unit is not presentefficiency_method is not presentyear is not present type is one of [central_furnace, wall_furnace, boiler] AND fuel_primary is not electric efficiency_unit is afue AND efficiency is minimum value of 0.6, maximum value of 1 AND fuel_primary is one of [natural_gas, lpg, fuel_oil] type is one of [heat_pump, mini_split] efficiency_unit is one of [hspf, hspf2] AND efficiency is minimum value of 6, maximum value of 20 AND fuel_primary is electric type is gchp efficiency_unit is cop AND efficiency is minimum value of 2, maximum value of 5 AND fuel_primary is electric AND efficiency_method is user type is baseboard efficiency is not presentefficiency_unit is not presentefficiency_method is not presentyear is not present type is one of [wood_stove] efficiency_unit is not presentefficiency is not presentefficiency_method is not presentyear is not present

Constant: wood_stove

docs.title: Home Energy Score JSON Schema
docs.text:
Defined in: hescore_json.schema.json.schema.json Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title version string address address Address hpwes home_performance_with_energy_star Home Performance With Energy Star about about About zone zone Zone systems systems Systems

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate about.dwelling_unit_type is apartment_unit address2 is present in address about.manufactured_home_sections is one of [double-wide, triple-wide] zone.zone_roof does not contain zone_roof_with_bowstring_roof about.dwelling_unit_type is manufactured_home zone.zone_wall does not contain zone_wall_assembly_code_for_manufactured_homes zone.zone_roof does not contain zone_roof_with_vented_or_conditioned_attic systems.hvac contain hvac_distribution_duct_validation_object about.dwelling_unit_type is one of [single_family_detached, manufactured_home] zone.zone_wall does not contain zone_wall_adjacent_to_other_space about.dwelling_unit_type is one of [apartment_unit, single_family_attached] systems.generation.solar_electric.system_capacity is minimum value of 0.05, maximum value of 200 AND num_panels is minimum value of 1, maximum value of 1000 about.dwelling_unit_type is not one of [apartment_unit, single_family_attached] systems.generation.solar_electric.number_units_sharing_system existssystem_capacity is minimum value of 0.05, maximum value of 20 AND num_panels is minimum value of 1, maximum value of 100 zone.zone_roof contain zone_roof_with_bowstring_roof about.dwelling_unit_type is manufactured_home zone.zone_roof contain zone_roof_with_below_other_unit_roof OR zone.zone_floor contain zone_floor_with_above_other_unit_foundation about.dwelling_unit_type is one of [single_family_attached, apartment_unit] zone.zone_floor contain zone_floor_with_slab_on_grade_foundation about has no key/smanufactured_home_dwelling_type_object zone.zone_floor does not contain zone_floor_with_vented_crawlspace_foundation systems.hvac contain hvac_without_vented_crawlspace_duct zone.zone_floor does not contain zone_floor_with_unvented_crawlspace_foundation systems.hvac contain hvac_without_unvented_crawlspace_duct zone.zone_floor does not contain zone_floor_with_unconditioned_basement_foundation systems.hvac contain hvac_without_unconditioned_basement_duct zone.zone_floor does not contain zone_floor_with_belly_and_wing_foundation systems.hvac contain hvac_without_belly_and_wing_duct zone.zone_floor contain zone_floor_with_belly_and_wing_foundation about.dwelling_unit_type is manufactured_home systems.hvac contain hvac_with_manufactured_home_belly_duct about.dwelling_unit_type is manufactured_home

docs.title: version
docs.text:
The version of the building unit schema. Use semantic versioning.

  • is required
  • Type: string

Constant: 4.0

• is required

• is required

• is required

docs.title: systems

docs.title: Home performance with energy star
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema

docs.title: Home Performance With Energy Star
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title improvement_installation_start_date string date improvement_installation_completion_date string date contractor_zip_code string contractor_business_name string is_income_eligible_program boolean

docs.title: improvement_installation_start_date
docs.text:
The date on which HPwES upgrade installation began, in YYYY-MM-DD format

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: improvement_installation_completion_date
docs.text:
The date on which HPwES upgrade installation was completed, in YYYY-MM-DD format

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: contractor_zip_code
docs.text:
Five-digit postal code of the contractor installing the HPwES upgrades

  • is not required
  • Type: string

Regex Pattern: ^[0-9]{5}$

docs.title: contractor_business_name
docs.text:
The name of the contracting business installing the HPwES upgrades

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: is_income_eligible_program
docs.text:
Whether or not the HPwES upgrades were performed for a homeowner participating in an income-eligible program

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: Hvac distribution
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / hvac / hvac_item

docs.title: HVAC Distribution
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: True

Property Type Required Format Title leakage_method enum leakage_to_outside number sealed boolean duct hvac_distribution_duct HVAC Distribution Duct

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate leakage_method is qualitative sealed is present AND leakage_to_outside is not present leakage_method is quantitative leakage_to_outside is present AND sealed is not present

docs.title: leakage_method
docs.text:
Method for duct leakage inputs

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value qualitative quantitative

docs.title: leakage_to_outside
docs.text:
Duct leakage to outside in CFM25 (only used if leakage_method is quantitative)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 1000

docs.title: sealed
docs.text:
Are the ducts sealed? (only used if leakage_method is qualitative)

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: duct
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: hvac_distribution_duct

Minimum number of items: 1

docs.title: Hvac distribution duct
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / hvac / hvac_item / hvac_distribution

docs.title: HVAC Distribution Duct
docs.text: Type: array[hvac_distribution_duct_item]

docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / hvac / hvac_item / hvac_distribution / hvac_distribution_duct

docs.title: HVAC Distribution Duct Item
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title name enum location string fraction number insulated boolean

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate fraction has exclusive minimum value of 0 location, insulated are present

docs.title: name
docs.text:
Name of distribution system

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value duct1 duct2 duct3

docs.title: location
docs.text:
Location of distribution system

  • is not required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: cond_space

Constant: uncond_basement

Constant: vented_crawl

Constant: unvented_crawl

Constant: uncond_attic

Constant: under_slab

Constant: exterior_wall

Constant: manufactured_home_belly

Constant: outside

docs.title: fraction
docs.text:
Fraction of total duct length

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 1

docs.title: insulated
docs.text:
Are the ducts insulated?

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: Hvac item
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / hvac

docs.title: HVAC Item
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title hvac_name enum hvac_fraction number heating heating Heating cooling cooling Cooling hvac_distribution hvac_distribution HVAC Distribution

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate heating.type is one of [central_furnace, wall_furnace, baseboard, boiler] cooling.type is one of [packaged_dx, split_dx, mini_split, dec, none] heating.type is heat_pump cooling.type is one of [packaged_dx, heat_pump, dec, none] heating.type is gchp cooling.type is one of [packaged_dx, gchp, dec, none] heating.type is mini_split cooling.type is one of [packaged_dx, mini_split, dec, none] cooling.type is split_dx heating.type is one of [central_furnace, wall_furnace, baseboard, boiler, wood_stove, none] cooling.type is heat_pump heating.type is one of [heat_pump, wood_stove, none] cooling.type is gchp heating.type is one of [gchp, wood_stove, none] cooling.type is mini_split heating.type is one of [central_furnace, wall_furnace, baseboard, boiler, mini_split, wood_stove, none] heating.type is one of [central_furnace, heat_pump, gchp] hvac_distribution is present cooling.type is one of [split_dx, heat_pump, gchp] hvac_distribution is present heating.type is one of [wall_furnace, baseboard, boiler, mini_split, wood_stove, none] AND cooling.type is one of [packaged_dx, mini_split, dec, none] hvac_distribution is not present

docs.title: hvac_name
docs.text:
Name of this system instance

  • is required

Value hvac1 hvac2

docs.text:
Fraction of conditioned floor area served by this system

Maximum Number: 1 Exclusive Minimum: 0

docs.text:

Property Type Required Format Title hvac_distribution hvac_distribution_without_vented_crawlspace_duct HVAC Distribution Without Vented Crawlspace Duct

docs.title: hvac_distribution
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: hvac_distribution_without_vented_crawlspace_duct

docs.title: Knee Wall
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title area number assembly_code enum

docs.title: area
docs.text:
Knee wall area

  • is required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 5000

docs.title: assembly_code
docs.text:
Knee wall assembly code

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value kwwf00 kwwf03 kwwf07 kwwf11 kwwf13 kwwf15 kwwf19 kwwf21

docs.title: Manufactured home dwelling type object

docs.text:

Property Type Required Format Title dwelling_unit_type manufactured_home

docs.title: dwelling_unit_type
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: manufactured_home

Constant: manufactured_home

docs.title: Solar electric
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / systems / generation

docs.title: Solar Electric
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title capacity_known boolean system_capacity number num_panels integer number_units_sharing_system integer year integer array_azimuth enum array_tilt enum

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate capacity_known is True capacity_known, system_capacity are present AND num_panels is not present capacity_known is not True AND capacity_known is False capacity_known, num_panels are present AND system_capacity is not present

docs.title: capacity_known
docs.text:
Is the capacity known?

  • is required
  • Type: boolean

docs.title: system_capacity
docs.text:
DC capacity of system (kW) (only used if capacity_known is true)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

docs.title: num_panels
docs.text:
Number of panels in the system (only used if capacity_known is false)

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

docs.title: number_units_sharing_system
docs.text:
Total number of units sharing the PV system

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 1

docs.title: year
docs.text:
Year system was installed

  • is required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 2000

docs.title: array_azimuth
docs.text:
Direction panels face

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value north north_east east south_east south south_west west north_west

docs.title: array_tilt
docs.text:
Tilt of panels

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value flat low_slope medium_slope steep_slope

docs.title: Systems
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema

docs.title: Systems
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title hvac hvac HVAC domestic_hot_water domestic_hot_water Domestic Hot Water generation generation Generation

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate domestic_hot_water.category is combined hvac contain hvac_contains_boiler_heater hvac contain hvac_without_heating_and_cooling Number of items in hvac is less than or equal to 1

docs.title: hvac
docs.text:
Inputs about the HVAC system(s)

  • is required
  • Type: hvac

Minimum number of items: 1

docs.title: domestic_hot_water
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: domestic_hot_water

docs.title: generation
docs.text:
• is not required
  • Type: generation

docs.title: Zone
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema

docs.title: Zone
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title zone_roof zone_roof Zone Roof zone_floor zone_floor Zone Floor zone_wall zone_wall Zone Wall

docs.title: zone_roof
docs.text:
Inputs about the construction of the roof(s)

  • is required
  • Type: zone_roof

Minimum number of items: 0

docs.title: zone_floor
docs.text:
Inputs about the construction of the floor(s)

  • is required
  • Type: zone_floor

Minimum number of items: 0

docs.title: zone_wall
docs.text:
Inputs about the construction of the walls

  • is required
  • Type: zone_wall

Items should be unique: True Minimum number of items: 4

docs.title: Zone floor
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone

docs.title: Zone Floor
docs.text: Type: array[zone_floor_item]

docs.title: Zone floor item
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone / zone_floor

docs.title: Zone Floor Item
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title floor_name enum floor_area number foundation_type string foundation_insulation_level integer floor_assembly_code enum

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate foundation_type is one of [slab_on_grade, above_other_unit, cond_basement] floor_assembly_code is not present foundation_type is slab_on_grade foundation_insulation_level is one of [0, 5] foundation_type is one of [uncond_basement, cond_basement, unvented_crawl, vented_crawl] foundation_insulation_level is one of [0, 11, 19] foundation_type is one of [above_other_unit, belly_and_wing] foundation_insulation_level is not present foundation_type is belly_and_wing floor_assembly_code match pattern ^efbw[0-9]{2}$ foundation_type is one of [uncond_basement, unvented_crawl, vented_crawl] floor_assembly_code match pattern ^efwf[0-9]{2}ca$

docs.title: floor_name
docs.text:
Name of this floor instance

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value floor1 floor2

docs.title: floor_area
docs.text:
Area of this foundation type

  • is required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 25000

docs.title: foundation_type
docs.text:
Type of foundation

  • is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: slab_on_grade

Constant: uncond_basement

Constant: cond_basement

Constant: unvented_crawl

Constant: vented_crawl

Constant: above_other_unit

Constant: belly_and_wing

docs.title: foundation_insulation_level
docs.text:
Foundation wall / slab edge insulation R-value (sf-hr-F/Btu)

  • is not required
  • Type: integer

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 19

docs.title: floor_assembly_code
docs.text:
Floor construction assembly code (only used if foundation_type is not slab_on_grade, above_other_unit, or cond_basement)

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value efwf00ca efwf03ca efwf07ca efwf11ca efwf13ca efwf15ca efwf19ca efwf21ca efwf25ca efwf30ca efwf35ca efwf38ca efbw00 efbw11 efbw13 efbw19 efbw22 efbw30

docs.title: Zone roof
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone

docs.title: Zone Roof
docs.text: Type: array[zone_roof_item]

docs.title: Zone roof item
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone / zone_roof

docs.title: Zone Roof Item
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title roof_name enum ceiling_area number roof_area number roof_assembly_code enum roof_color enum roof_absorptance number roof_type string ceiling_assembly_code enum knee_wall knee_wall Knee Wall zone_skylight zone_skylight Zone Skylight

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate roof_type is one of [vented_attic, cath_ceiling, flat_roof, bowstring_roof] roof_assembly_code, roof_color are present roof_type is not one of [vented_attic, cath_ceiling, flat_roof, bowstring_roof] roof_color is not present roof_type is bowstring_roof roof_assembly_code is one of [rfwf00co, rfwf00wo, rfwf00rc, rfwf00lc, rfwf00tg, rfwf03co, rfwf03wo, rfwf03rc, rfwf03lc, rfwf03tg, rfwf07co, rfwf07wo, rfwf07rc, rfwf07lc, rfwf07tg, rfwf11co, rfwf11wo, rfwf11rc, rfwf11lc, rfwf11tg, rfwf13co, rfwf13wo, rfwf13rc, rfwf13lc, rfwf13tg, rfwf15co, rfwf15wo, rfwf15rc, rfwf15lc, rfwf15tg, rfwf19co, rfwf19wo, rfwf19rc, rfwf19lc, rfwf19tg, rfwf21co, rfwf21wo, rfwf21rc, rfwf21lc, rfwf21tg, rfwf25co, rfwf25wo, rfwf25rc, rfwf25lc, rfwf25tg, rfwf27co, rfwf27wo, rfwf27rc, rfwf27lc, rfwf27tg, rfwf30co, rfwf30wo, rfwf30rc, rfwf30lc, rfwf30tg, rfrb00co, rfrb00wo, rfrb00rc, rfrb00lc, rfrb00tg] roof_type is one of [cath_ceiling, flat_roof, bowstring_roof] roof_area is present AND ceiling_area is not presentceiling_assembly_code is not present roof_type is below_other_unit ceiling_area is present AND ceiling_assembly_code is not presentroof_assembly_code is not presentroof_area is not presentzone_skylight is not present roof_type is vented_attic ceiling_area, ceiling_assembly_code are present roof_color is cool_color roof_absorptance is present roof_color is not cool_color roof_absorptance is not present knee_wall exists roof_type is vented_attic

docs.title: roof_name
docs.text:
Name of this roof instance

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value roof1 roof2

docs.title: ceiling_area
docs.text:
Area of ceiling (attic floor), used if roof_type = vented_attic, below_other_unit

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 25000

docs.title: roof_area
docs.text:
Area of the roof, used if roof_type = cath_ceiling, flat_roof, bowstring_roof

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 1 Maximum Number: 25000

docs.title: roof_assembly_code
docs.text:
Roof construction assembly code

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value rfwf00co rfwf00wo rfwf00rc rfwf00lc rfwf00tg rfwf03co rfwf03wo rfwf03rc rfwf03lc rfwf03tg rfwf07co rfwf07wo rfwf07rc rfwf07lc rfwf07tg rfwf11co rfwf11wo rfwf11rc rfwf11lc rfwf11tg rfwf13co rfwf13wo rfwf13rc rfwf13lc rfwf13tg rfwf15co rfwf15wo rfwf15rc rfwf15lc rfwf15tg rfwf19co rfwf19wo rfwf19rc rfwf19lc rfwf19tg rfwf21co rfwf21wo rfwf21rc rfwf21lc rfwf21tg rfwf25co rfwf25wo rfwf25rc rfwf25lc rfwf25tg rfwf27co rfwf27wo rfwf27rc rfwf27lc rfwf27tg rfwf30co rfwf30wo rfwf30rc rfwf30lc rfwf30tg rfrb00co rfrb00wo rfrb00rc rfrb00lc rfrb00tg rfps00co rfps00wo rfps00rc rfps00lc rfps00tg rfps03co rfps03wo rfps03rc rfps03lc rfps03tg rfps07co rfps07wo rfps07rc rfps07lc rfps07tg rfps11co rfps11wo rfps11rc rfps11lc rfps11tg rfps13co rfps13wo rfps13rc rfps13lc rfps13tg rfps15co rfps15wo rfps15rc rfps15lc rfps15tg rfps19co rfps19wo rfps19rc rfps19lc rfps19tg rfps21co rfps21wo rfps21rc rfps21lc rfps21tg

docs.title: roof_color
docs.text:
Color of roof exterior surface

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value white light medium medium_dark dark cool_color

docs.title: roof_absorptance
docs.text:
Absorptance of exterior surface (only used if roof_color is cool_color)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 1

docs.title: roof_type
docs.text:
Type of roof

  • is required
  • Type: string

docs.title: One Of
docs.text:
Constant: vented_attic

Constant: cath_ceiling

Constant: below_other_unit

Constant: flat_roof

Constant: bowstring_roof

docs.title: ceiling_assembly_code
docs.text:
Ceiling construction assembly code (required unless roof_type is cath_ceiling)

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value ecwf00 ecwf03 ecwf06 ecwf09 ecwf11 ecwf13 ecwf15 ecwf19 ecwf21 ecwf25 ecwf30 ecwf35 ecwf38 ecwf44 ecwf49 ecwf55 ecwf60

docs.title: knee_wall
docs.text:
Knee wall inputs

  • is not required
  • Type: knee_wall

docs.title: zone_skylight
docs.text:
Inputs about the skylights on this roof

  • is not required
  • Type: zone_skylight

Constant: below_other_unit

docs.title: Zone skylight
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone / zone_roof / zone_roof_item

docs.title: Zone Skylight
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title skylight_area number skylight_method enum skylight_code enum skylight_u_value number skylight_shgc number solar_screen boolean

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate skylight_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 skylight_method is present skylight_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 AND skylight_method is code skylight_code is present AND skylight_u_value is not presentskylight_shgc is not present skylight_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 AND skylight_method is custom skylight_u_value, skylight_shgc are present AND skylight_code is not present

docs.title: skylight_area
docs.text:
Area of skylights (square feet)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 300

docs.title: skylight_method
docs.text:
Construction method to use for skylights

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value code custom

docs.title: skylight_code
docs.text:
Assembly code for skylights (only used if skylight_method is code)

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value scna scnw stna stnw dcaa dcab dcaw dtaa dtab dtaw dpeaw dpeaab dpeaaw dseaa dseab dseaw dseaaw thmabw

docs.title: skylight_u_value
docs.text:
U-value of skylights (Btu/sf-hr-F) (only used if skylight_method is custom)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0.01 Maximum Number: 5

docs.title: skylight_shgc
docs.text:
Solar heat gain coefficient of skylights (only used if skylight_method is custom)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Exclusive Minimum: 0

docs.title: solar_screen
docs.text:
Does this skylight have a solar screen?

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean

docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone

docs.text: Type: array[zone_wall_item]

Property Type Required Format Title adjacent_to enum

docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: enum
Value other_unit other_heated_space other_multifamily_buffer_space other_non_freezing_space

docs.title: Zone Wall Assembly Code For Manufactured Homes
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: True

Property Type Required Format Title wall_assembly_code enum

docs.title: wall_assembly_code
docs.text:
• is required
  • Type: enum
Value ewov19wo ewov19st ewov19vi ewov19al ewov19br ewov21wo ewov21st ewov21vi ewov21al ewov21br ewov25wo ewov25st ewov25vi ewov25al ewov25br ewov27wo ewov27st ewov27vi ewov27al ewov27br ewov33wo ewov33st ewov33vi ewov33al ewov33br ewov35wo ewov35st ewov35vi ewov35al ewov35br ewov38wo ewov38st ewov38vi ewov38al ewov38br ewbr00nn ewbr05nn ewbr10nn ewcb00st ewcb00br ewcb00nn ewcb03st ewcb03br ewcb03nn ewcb06st ewcb06br ewcb06nn ewsb00st

docs.title: Zone wall item
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone / zone_wall

docs.title: Zone Wall Item
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title side enum wall_assembly_code enum adjacent_to enum zone_window zone_window Zone Window

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate adjacent_to is one of [outside, other_heated_space, other_multifamily_buffer_space, other_non_freezing_space] wall_assembly_code is present adjacent_to is other_unit wall_assembly_code is not present adjacent_to is outside zone_window is present adjacent_to is not outside zone_window is not present adjacent_to is one of [other_heated_space, other_multifamily_buffer_space, other_non_freezing_space] wall_assembly_code is one of [iwwf00, iwwf03, iwwf07, iwwf11, iwwf13, iwwf15, iwwf19, iwwf21]

docs.title: side
docs.text:
Side this wall faces

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value front back right left

docs.title: wall_assembly_code
docs.text:
Wall construction assembly code

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value ewwf00wo ewwf00st ewwf00vi ewwf00al ewwf00br ewwf03wo ewwf03st ewwf03vi ewwf03al ewwf03br ewwf07wo ewwf07st ewwf07vi ewwf07al ewwf07br ewwf11wo ewwf11st ewwf11vi ewwf11al ewwf11br ewwf13wo ewwf13st ewwf13vi ewwf13al ewwf13br ewwf15wo ewwf15st ewwf15vi ewwf15al ewwf15br ewwf19wo ewwf19st ewwf19vi ewwf19al ewwf19br ewwf21wo ewwf21st ewwf21vi ewwf21al ewwf21br ewsf00wo ewsf00st ewsf00vi ewsf00al ewsf00br ewsf03wo ewsf03st ewsf03vi ewsf03al ewsf03br ewsf07wo ewsf07st ewsf07vi ewsf07al ewsf07br ewsf11wo ewsf11st ewsf11vi ewsf11al ewsf11br ewsf13wo ewsf13st ewsf13vi ewsf13al ewsf13br ewsf15wo ewsf15st ewsf15vi ewsf15al ewsf15br ewsf19wo ewsf19st ewsf19vi ewsf19al ewsf19br ewsf21wo ewsf21st ewsf21vi ewsf21al ewsf21br ewps00wo ewps00st ewps00vi ewps00al ewps00br ewps03wo ewps03st ewps03vi ewps03al ewps03br ewps07wo ewps07st ewps07vi ewps07al ewps07br ewps11wo ewps11st ewps11vi ewps11al ewps11br ewps13wo ewps13st ewps13vi ewps13al ewps13br ewps15wo ewps15st ewps15vi ewps15al ewps15br ewps19wo ewps19st ewps19vi ewps19al ewps19br ewps21wo ewps21st ewps21vi ewps21al ewps21br ewov19wo ewov19st ewov19vi ewov19al ewov19br ewov21wo ewov21st ewov21vi ewov21al ewov21br ewov25wo ewov25st ewov25vi ewov25al ewov25br ewov27wo ewov27st ewov27vi ewov27al ewov27br ewov33wo ewov33st ewov33vi ewov33al ewov33br ewov35wo ewov35st ewov35vi ewov35al ewov35br ewov38wo ewov38st ewov38vi ewov38al ewov38br ewbr00nn ewbr05nn ewbr10nn ewcb00st ewcb00br ewcb00nn ewcb03st ewcb03br ewcb03nn ewcb06st ewcb06br ewcb06nn ewsb00st iwwf00 iwwf03 iwwf07 iwwf11 iwwf13 iwwf15 iwwf19 iwwf21

docs.title: adjacent_to
docs.text:
What is on the other side of the wall

  • is required
  • Type: enum
Value outside other_unit other_heated_space other_multifamily_buffer_space other_non_freezing_space

docs.title: zone_window
docs.text:
Inputs about the windows on this wall

  • is not required
  • Type: zone_window

docs.title: Zone window
docs.text: home_energy_score_json_schema / zone / zone_wall / zone_wall_item

docs.title: Zone Window
docs.text:
Type: object Additional Properties Allowed: False

Property Type Required Format Title window_area number window_method enum window_code enum window_u_value number window_shgc number solar_screen boolean

docs.title: Conditional Validation
docs.text: if true validate window_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 AND window_method is code window_code is present AND window_u_value, window_shgc are not present window_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 AND window_method is not code AND window_method is custom window_u_value, window_shgc are present AND window_code is not present window_area has exclusive minimum value of 0 window_area is present

docs.title: window_area
docs.text:
Area of windows on this wall (square feet)

  • is required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0 Maximum Number: 999

docs.title: window_method
docs.text:
Construction method to use for this window

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value code custom

docs.title: window_code
docs.text:
assembly code for this window (only used if window_method is code)

  • is not required
  • Type: enum
Value scna scnw stna stnw dcaa dcab dcaw dtaa dtab dtaw dpeaw dpeaab dpeaaw dseaa dseab dseaw dseaaw thmabw

docs.title: window_u_value
docs.text:
U-value of this window (Btu/sf-hr-F) (only used if window_method is custom)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Minimum Number: 0.01 Maximum Number: 5

docs.title: window_shgc
docs.text:
Solar heat gain coefficient of this window (only used if window_method is custom)

  • is not required
  • Type: number

Exclusive Minimum: 0

docs.title: solar_screen
docs.text:
Does this window have a solar screen?

  • is not required
  • Type: boolean
